summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.3°C) and outside temperature (down 2.2°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 811 m) and light levels (up 12539 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14507 lux), cloud levels (up 1508 m), feels like temperature (up 5.3°C), and outside temperature (up 3.8°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 810.9m lower than yesterday, 621.2m lower than the past week, 1507.6m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1175.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1796.7m and 2680m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, occasional overcast conditions, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Weather could become unsettled.
